website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that will help you perfect your golf swing in no time at all.
pros: Equipped with a heavy head and flexible shaft to help you develop a consistent golf swing
cons: Shaft is less flexible than some models

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but it helped me with my tempo. It works. I don’t know how the more expensive equipment similar to this works but I assume it will work the same.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Dizon

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than most others and does the exact same thing. Some folks on facebook are advertising theirs for 3x the cost of these. Great product, really enjoying swinging it.
customer_reviews.author: Livermore, CA

customer_reviews.title: It helped me on the range!
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked swinging this thing around the house. It felt good. A bit more weighted than a regular long iron. I was swinging it around the house quite a bit as I focused on my straight swing... but then thought to myself that I could probably have the same results just by swinging a regular iron with a donut weight. SO I returned it the same evening... The next afternoon I went to the golf range to hit a bucket of balls. I actually believed I was actually swinging much better at the range. My clubs felt lighter, my swing was smoother, AND my slice was 100% GONE! SOOO... I am repurchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Artist / Musician

customer_reviews.title: Good, but big hands need jumbo grip
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only complaint is that I need a jumbo grip and this really fatigues my hands trying to hang on even at slower speeds. Heavier than a regular club which is great but you may want to get some vet wrap or bat grip wrap to bulk up the grip. You can’t regrip with normal club grips as it is a 1/4-1/3” fiberglass or plastic rod where the grip sits and is firmly attached. You can really get the tempo feel with this and I find a few minutes is quite a workout. Definitely feel the muscles in my back working. Encourages proper balance due to the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Every time I go to the driving range I first take ten swings with it before I start my practice. The weight of this tool forces you to slow down your wind-up, putting you in a better position to swing more accurately. I feel it has made my swing stronger and I have added about 10 yards to my drives. I've had to readjust which clubs I use for specific distances because I started to go over my target.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Stays in bag all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Loosens you up before your round if you don’t have time to hit a bucket of balls. Also use it middle of round when having to wait a lot in scrambles.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE WITHROW

customer_reviews.title: REGRIP
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well to increase range of motion. So I cut the grip off before realizing it “can’t be regripped”. With some work it can certainly be done. With the grip off, I wrapped a piece of grip tape around the fiberglass rod. I’m not sure if the tape was necessary or not. I then put gorilla glue on the fiberglass rod and slid a piece of 3/8 in PEX piping over the rod. Let it dry for a day or so, good to go. Threw 5-6 pieces of grip tape on it, progressively thicker towards the end. New grip on it like a regular club and it’s been good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Danielson

customer_reviews.title: It only takes a few minutes every day to improve my swing.
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, the delivery time was great, and the quality was excellent. It helps me stretch, and loosen up before I play. And it has increased my swing speed, and timing.
customer_reviews.author: scott carruthers

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Excited to Use with Clients
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday and he loved it. He played mini tour golf and now gives lessons and has amassed a ton of equipment and training aids through the years. He was impressed with the quality of this and is excited to begin using it with some of his clients.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Swing trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great swing trainer. Just enough weight on the pole to force you to follow through
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Hegstad

customer_reviews.title: Great Warm Up Tool
customer_reviews.text: Very good warm up tool and it will help you see the path of your swing. If you use it, it will help in flexibility. The only con, I wanted a different grip and it has an unusual grip that I can't find anywhere and didn't see a customer service contact.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: great item at a much better price than most others
customer_reviews.text: it's great for warmups, finding your plane, grooving your swing, developing more lag, and you can swing it inside your home without hitting the ceiling or other objects in a tight space. also put it in your bag-better when it's slow play and you're waiting to hit a shot than just practice swings with your club. a winner in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, improved hitting distance.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it and he has noticed he gets more distance in hitting his golf balls. He is well pleased with it. He does it with his stretching and workout routine every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training aid
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend this product for three reasons: 1. The product itself is as advertised 2. It is reasonably priced 3. It has already helped my game in a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: Scotchpete

customer_reviews.title: The Balight Golf Swing Trainer does the job as well as more expensive trainers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Balight Golf Swing Trainer to help my golf swing. Although there are more expensive trainers like it on the market, the Balight Golf Swing Trainer is just as good. Certainly works for me and am already seeing the benefit of it, swinging with it about three days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Improves tempo if you are a fast swinger. Aides in the transition from back swing to down swing. Will in time increase the distance of your back swing do to its stretching affect.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: A must for serious golfers
customer_reviews.text: Love it as warm up, and training device. Maybe the best I’ve ever had. I’m no youngster but off days will try to swing 40-50 times to train muscles and rhythm.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped groove my golf swing. I'm 68 years old and have shot rounds of 76, 77, and 78 from the regular men's tees since purchasing the Balight. I could shoot in the 70's before, but I am more consistent now. I highly recommend getting one if you want to improve your game. There are lots of videos on YouTube to help with how to best utilize it. Many of them are for the Orange Whip, but you can still use the same principles.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Slow swing
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised but the stick is really flexible. I would like it to be a just a little bit stiffer.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Calle

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a warm up tool
customer_reviews.text: I use it to warm up each time l’m at the driving range before round. Although the handle it slightly smaller than a regular size golf grip, that’s easily solved by wrapping around grip tape to increase the size.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works like a top!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shipping and an outstanding product at the right price!!!! You can buy a similar trainer for a 100 bucks and get the same quality and work out as this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jptlmcj

customer_reviews.title: Swing away!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product. Just need instructions for proper use/training
customer_reviews.author: journeyman291

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the expensive golf trainers.
customer_reviews.text: My Husband absolutely loved this. Outstanding quality for the price. Just as good as the expensive ones out there. This will really help his golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but he's happy to have it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiance to help him improve his golf swing. He said the weight at the bottom is just enough to keep him focused, without putting strain on his back. Not sure how much his swing will improve over time, but he's happy to have it, especially at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Law Student

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect for me when I get the the course and take my warmup swings
customer_reviews.author: james g williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as the original swing trainer but it works to warm up my swing before hitting the course.
customer_reviews.author: J.Dufault

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training aid!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed. Excellent training aid!
customer_reviews.author: Robert King

customer_reviews.title: As good as the orange.
customer_reviews.text: This product is as good as the more expensive orange one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Buckles

customer_reviews.title: it helps your golf
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift to my sister who is just taking up golf
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Helps with the pause in backswing that’s tough for me to accept.
customer_reviews.author: Camo

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Swing improved! Love this power flex golf swing trainer I've tried different swing training aids of different shapes and sizes and this is for real!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great golf swing training aid
customer_reviews.text: Use this a few times a week and it'll improve your golf swing!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great gives you a good stretch. Way cheaper than others
customer_reviews.author: michael kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Golf swing aid
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected. I need to use it more to improve my golf swing.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Really Helps
customer_reviews.text: After 2 hip replacements and a bad back from over 30 years in construction after a few swings with the product it helps loosen the muscles in my back and hips a does the same warm up as hitting a small bucket of balls on the range without the impact!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Powell

customer_reviews.title: Viable for any level of golfer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I bought this to keep a fluid swing tempo. When I am unable to hit the range, this is perfect to swing while watching some TV to keep loose and keep that good head lag swing tempo. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM Soneriu

customer_reviews.title: Useful for all golfers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to warm up at the course and get a good feel for the right swing mechanics.
customer_reviews.author: Jeprox

customer_reviews.title: Arm builder
customer_reviews.text: Swing a few times before I head to the course.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: Great warm up tool!
customer_reviews.text: New to golf and wanted a way to increase my club head speed. I warm up with it before every round I play and practice in my yard. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Darren J.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the ridiculously over priced type
customer_reviews.text: Works great and just as well as the more expensive type. The price most likely reflects the real cost of manufacturing the device. I mean it's not a great deal of technology going into these training aids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations and save me some coin. The one I was going to purchase was $109 from Dick's. Grip was small so I built it up with some Anti slip Overgrip.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Item came on time and in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: After one day of use, I can see how useful it is. Flexibility, strength, and speed are all aspects of my game which will improve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent golf warm up and training aid
customer_reviews.text: I had one with the orange ball and orange whip golf swing trainer worked great. I found this yellow flex golf trainer on Amazon and bought it for backup.the golf swing training aid, it works as well as the orange one that I have.

customer_reviews.title: It works, however it’s no Orange Whip.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Brand-X version of the Orange Whip only because of the price. It doesn’t have the same whip effect at the top of your backswing to produce lag. I’ve used the original Orange Whip, and once again, you get what you pay for. Just know that going in.
customer_reviews.author: Zowskin

customer_reviews.title: really helps to feel the swing
customer_reviews.text: It helped me to bring my club back and forward correctly
customer_reviews.author: cjb

customer_reviews.title: this is a too that every golfer should have to practice with
customer_reviews.text: haven't had a chance to use it much, but i'll bet it will really help my swing speed, no doubt about t
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good for loosening up before a round
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my bag to loosen up and swing out before a round. It's been a nice adjunct
customer_reviews.author: Alan Snell

customer_reviews.title: great for your game
customer_reviews.text: delivered as promised and what a way to start your round has helped my game

customer_reviews.title: Worth checking out
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband which was recommended by a good friend he brought it to his golf match and everybody wanted to check it out he was pleased

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This swing trainer has worked as advertised. Has helped get my swing on plane and the results are showing up on the golf course. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great to get warmed up when a driving range is not available
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get stretched out before a round. It’s a little more flexible than popular name brands. Won’t mimic your driver unless you have super senior flex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for improving body mechanics
customer_reviews.text: I can tell after just a few swings and a few days that this tool is already improving my body mechanics. Highly recommend!!!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and item was as advertised. Completely satisfied. I use it to loosen up before and sometimes during each round.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best training aide for learning how to grip the club. It is easy to install on the club and you can use it on all of your clubs

customer_reviews.title: Lower price, Higher quality
customer_reviews.text: This swing trainer feels like ones that are much more expensive. Sometimes lesser known brands have a cheaper feel and I am happy to say that this one feels extremely well made. Thank you for such an effective inexpensive product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Risinger

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great training tool. It works as well as the more expensive similar ones.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery. Good price. Hope it helps my golf game.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money

customer_reviews.title: Balight Golf Swing Trainer is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This swing trainer helps with all the things mentioned in it’s description. It seems to be the same quality of other swing trainers I’ve seen in golf shops that cost more. The item I purchased was repackaged but it looks 100% like new and that lowered the price even more.
customer_reviews.author: Older and wiser gent

customer_reviews.title: great golf exercise tool,,,,
customer_reviews.text: this works out the essential areas for a golf swing, great warm up without having to hit balls

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Don't spend the money on higher priced versions for essentially the same thing ! I'm very happy with mine !!

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and use it almost every day. It has helped drop my handicap.

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for someone. I hope they like it.

customer_reviews.title: Swing Trainer Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: This trainer is helping me transfer my weight. And strengthen my core. Glad for the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the expensive brand!
customer_reviews.text: This swing trainer helped my swing immensely. It seriously helps with timing and is a useful tool to warm up before hitting the 1st tee. This isn't the only reason I've improved rapidly but it helped. I went from anhuy never breaking 100 to scoring an 83 in a matter of 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool
customer_reviews.text: This is just as good as those 100 dollar ones, my buddy paid 90 bucks for one and we compared them side by side no difference

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A few minutes watching YouTube for advice and a few minutes a day using the swing trainer and I can already notice a difference in my timing.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered. The golf swing training aid met my expectation. I use it to warm up and it helps me get my swing tempo before the first hole.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful and just as good as the orange whip. I have friends who are using the orange paid three times more and I cannot tell a difference other than a little ball on the end.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swing tool, but I wished I would have gotten the longer version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Grip and Handle could be a little better but it does the job. Why spend more on the expensive one when this does the same thing for much less. Thanks for the value

customer_reviews.title: Good practice tool
customer_reviews.text: I would of liked for the grip to have hand positioning on it for correct gripping

customer_reviews.title: great golf instructional aid
customer_reviews.text: Immediate feedback. Tells you naturally swinging backswing, and follow through flaws. Just pick it up and swing.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. Helps stretch out shoulders and back ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Helps stretch out shoulders and back before playing. Slightly less flex than the Orange Whip, but still adequate for the purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to swing,might as well practice while on quarantine.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it's supposed to. I swing it everyday, had it for a week and already noticing more range in my hips and shoulders.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for at a great price

customer_reviews.title: Useful for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it helps my golf swing (haven't played since I bought it) but it does stretch out the muscles that are involved. I love it

customer_reviews.text: Would've been nice if it came with instructions had nothing on box on how to properly utilize training aid .

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as the orange ball swing trainer that sells for $99.00!

customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a golf swing trainer? It works great!

customer_reviews.text: Why buy the expensive ones, this works great. Big help with swing tempo

customer_reviews.text: This product was just want I expected it to be! The best part is that it was much more reasonably priced.

customer_reviews.text: This item does a good job to loosen you up before a round of golf and get you into a good tempo.

customer_reviews.text: I like it. My swing needs a lot of work. It’s definitely helping

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I have used a similar type before.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what was ordered and seems to work well!

customer_reviews.title: Swing trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to warm up before playing golf....especially if no range facilities are available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m coming back
customer_reviews.text: Had back surgery and it really help me re hab
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Not the orange whip
customer_reviews.text: The product itself I did not like at all, the weight was different than orange whip and sklz being alot lighter than expected. I returned immediately after opening up and I'm giving 3 stars solely because the company was quick to take a return and refund me. I just bit my tounge and forked put everything for the orange whip and what a difference I noticed between the 2 products. A golf lesson itself is usually $60 so the way I see it orange whip will provide multiple lessons building my swing plane and tempo. If your having orange whip expectations do not buy this then.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It didnt seem as efficient as the orange whip trainer
customer_reviews.text: The Baleigh is much lighter than the orange whip,especially in the grip end. the grip is also much thinner and tends to spin in your hands . I am going to try to modify the Baleigh with a thicker ,heavier grip to see if it can be as effective as the orange whip. The much lower price makes it worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why does the handle slide off so easily!!!!!? Swung a few dozen times before the handle and the shaft started to separate. It appears that the handle only hangs over not even an inch onto the shaft so it falls apart very easily. Don't buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Apoptosis007

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY 48" SIZE IF YOU ARE UNDER 5'10"
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a hair above 5'9'' and the 48" trainer is far too long unless you're at least over 5'10". The 48" trainer "bottoms out" on the down swing and will slam into the ground well before you would normally make impact - and that's even with me choking down on the grip by 3-4 inches. The 40" size would be perfect, but the seller's page gave clear instructions that the 48" was for individuals 5'6" or taller... it's very clear whoever wrote that description has little to no understanding of a proper golf swing. I also think the shaft needs a stiffer "flex."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better grip
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great tool to warm up with but on day 1 I swing the grip right off the thing and the black plastic piece already cracked. It’s sitting in my grave with plastic bonding glue on it right now. I hope tomorrow when I use it again the grip won’t be sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: John Pinage

product_meta.title: Balight Golf Swing Trainer Aid and Correction for Strength Grip Tempo & Flexibility Training Suit for Indoor Practice Chipping Hitting Golf Accessories
feature_bullets: 【Size Selection Method 】The 48 inch is recommended for individuals 5’6" or taller, or those who are stronger and more advanced in their golf game. The 40 inch length is ideal for those who are under 5’6" or who are at a beginner or intermediate level

【Swing Correction & Improvement 】Convinient swing tempo trainer best essentials for the beginner practice. Improve your golf swing tempo and swing plane with the heavy head and slightly flexible shaft to deliver more consistent golf shots off the tee
【Ideal Golf Trainer for Busy Crowd】 You can carry it anywhere and practice indoor day or night. No limit to the usage scenario as the small space. Ideal golf trainer for the urban busy crowd!

【Building Muscle Strength】The flexible shaft will naturally give you feedback to adjust the tempo and swing plane for a more. Build muscle memory and strengthen your swing with the 2.5lb. It is good way to give you more power and better control
【30 Days Money Back】100% money back guarantee for any issue in 30 days, 90 days warranty support. You have no risk to try!
